alert.note: Alert for Gila (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 24 at 1:41PM MST until December 24 at 5:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Unbridged crossings along Tonto Creek in southern Gila County. * WHEN...Until midnight MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 140 PM MST, gauge reports indicated that flow in Tonto Creek has climbed above action stage, making unbridged crossings impassable. Flow in Tonto Creek is expected to continue to rise through the day. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tonto Basin. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
